location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 7: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to James Farish, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, submits a petition (not included) from Sookias Gaspar, formerly a compradore to the cruisers in the Gulf, for the consideration of the Honourable Governor in Council, Mountstuart Elphinstone.
